subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar spokesman Ramsey Poston said the 3M Performance 400 could be held as late as tomorrow before the series would be forced to move to its next event.
snippet: Nascar spokesman Ramsey Poston said the 3M Performance 400 could be held as late as tomorrow before the series would be forced to move to its next event.
